Installation¶

Dependencies¶

The GeoVille Storage Gate has the following dependencies:

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • geopandas

  • shapely

  • rasterio

  • rasterstats

  • affine

  • netCDF4

Another indirect dependency is GDAL

Installing with pip¶

You can install the GeoVille Storage Gate directly from Bitbucket with pip:

pip install https://<USER>:<PASSWORD>@bitbucket.org/geoville/geoville_ms_storage_gate_modul/get/master.zip

Installing from source¶

You may install the latest version by cloning the Bitbucket repository and using pip to install from the local directory:

git clone git@bitbucket.org:geoville/geoville_ms_storage_gate_modul.git
cd geoville_ms_storage_gate_modul
pip install -e .
